name: Gladiator Beast Claudius
desc:
5 "Gladiator Beast" monsters
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards from your field and/or GY into the Deck/Extra Deck. If Summoned this way: You can activate this effect; you can conduct your next Battle Phase twice. Once per turn, if your opponent activates a monster effect: You can activate the appropriate effect, depending on whose turn it is;
● Your turn: Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck.
● Your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 Level 11 or lower "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
